plans_desc_1: We offer a variety of plans to suit your needs. Whether you are an individual user, a small business, or a large corporation, we have the right plan for you.
plans_desc_2: Our plans are designed to help you grow your business, with features that allow you to connect with your customers and promote your products and services.
plans_desc_3: Choose the plan that best suits you and start growing your business today.

features.feature1: Support by voting for your favorite businesses.
features.feature2: Access to exclusive offers and promotions.
features.feature3: Opportunity to earn rewards and discounts.

features.feature1: All the benefits of the Private plan.
All the benefits of the Donor plan.
All the benefits of the Retailer plan.
features.feature3: Access to exclusive events and networking.
